chapter.name: Guest actions
chapter.help: Anonymous user is allowed access to already published documents and is able to search using simple or advanced options.

chapter.name: Pending QMRF documents
chapter.help: A list of documents that await administrative action.

chapter.name: Review document
chapter.help: Enter keywords and/or comments. Click Update button.

chapter.name: Publish new document
chapter.help: Click publish button will assign QMRF number of the form A-B-C-D, where A,B,C and D are defined below and publish the QMRF document.
Click "Retrieve number from catalog" to obtain corresponding numbers. If one of the fields is missing, return the document to the author to insert the missing data.

chapter.name: Verify if an user is a member of QMRF and model authors list.
chapter.help: Verifies if an author with the same e-mail address as for the user is a member of QMRF documents and models authors list. If not, provides a form to add a new author to the list.
The author names are usually appended when publishing documents into QMRF inventory.
The author list will be available as a lookup for relevant fields within QMRF editor.
